note:
What they say about people getting more moderate as they age... Yeah, not so much here... I'm farther to the left than ever, and beyond angry. I don't steep in that anger, I'm actively looking for ways to turn that energy into a positive force for change.

#CovidIsNotOver and the epidemic of gun deaths is certainly not over. The fight to get all people the same rights and privileges that I enjoy as a cis white male has barely even begun.

Politics aside, I tend to read history - most of the contemporary history I read is not focused on the US, as the last several decades of our politics have been toxic enough to live through. I've no desire to rehash that.

My BookWyrm is at https://b.djw.li/user/me - also a small instance.

A list of links is coming soon, so I don't have to keep updating bios every time I find a new Fediverse platform I'm enamored with!

Going to move my site to the shorter domain, I think, when I rebuild it - it's presently ugly to say the least.
